tool_description: All in one api where you can get everything that mobile app use for it's work
name: TikTok All in One
title: TikTok All in One

api_list.name: Feed(Trendings)
api_list.description: You can GET Feed(Trending) videos like you get in first screen of the app for any region(country) you want.

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
Specify a region for Feed(Trending) videos.
Supported any region like: RU, US, GB, DE, FR, ES, AU, BR, CA, GR, IL, IT, MX, NL, PE, PL, SE, UA, VE, etc...

api_list.name: User info
api_list.description: Get general info about user by id

api_list.name: Users search
api_list.description: Search users by user name

api_list.name: User recommendation
api_list.description: List of popular users in your region/country.

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
Specify a region to get list of relevant users from.
Supported any region like: RU, US, GB, DE, FR, ES, AU, BR, CA, GR, IL, IT, MX, NL, PE, PL, SE, UA, VE, etc...
Default is US

api_list.name: User suggested
api_list.description:
Get suggestion list of users that similar to another.
This is "Suggested" tab in user profile.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: User id to get list of similar users

optional_parameters.name: cursor
optional_parameters.description: \"cursor\" field from previous request response to get next list of users(offset for pagination)

api_list.name: User followers
api_list.description:
Get users followers list.
This is "Followers" button in user profile.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: User id for what you want get followers

optional_parameters.name: min_time
optional_parameters.description: \\\"min_time\\\" field from previous request response, is used to get next list of users(pagination)

api_list.name: User following
api_list.description:
Get user following list.
This is "Following" button in user profile.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: User id of the user you want get following list

optional_parameters.name: min_time
optional_parameters.description: \"min_time\" field from previous request response, is used to get next list of users(pagination)

api_list.name: Discover
api_list.description:
Get list of trending videos with specific hashtag for region(country).
This is "Discover" screen in the mobile app.

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
Specify a region(default US).
Supported any region like: RU, US, GB, DE, FR, ES, AU, BR, CA, GR, IL, IT, MX, NL, PE, PL, SE, UA, VE, etc...

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Offset to get more results if \\\\\\\"has_more\\\\\\\" field equal 1
It can be any positive integer or you can get it from \\\\\\\"cursor\\\\\\\" field

api_list.name: Hashtag videos
api_list.description: Get all videos that contain specific hashtag(challenge)

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Hashtag(challenge) id you can find in"cid" field (for example in hashtag search response)

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Offset to get more results if "has_more" field equal 1
It can be any positive integer or you can get it from "cursor" field

api_list.name: Hashtag(Challenge) info
api_list.description: Get general info about hashtag(challenge)

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Hashtag(challenge) id you can find in"cid" field (for example in hashtag search response)

api_list.name: Videos for music
api_list.description: Get info about all videos that use specific music(sound)

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Music id you can find in\"mid\" field (for example in music search response)

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Offset to get more results if \"has_more\" field equal 1
It can be any positive integer or you can get it from \"cursor\" field

api_list.name: Music info
api_list.description: Get all info about specific music(sound).

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Music id you can find in"mid" field (for example in music search response)

api_list.name: Users videos
api_list.description: Get all videos that specific user uploaded.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: User id you can find in \\\"uid\\\" field

optional_parameters.name: max_cursor
optional_parameters.description: Offset to get more results if in a response you get field \\\"has_more\\\" equal to 1 then you can use \\\"max_cursor\\\" field for this parameter

api_list.name: Live search
api_list.description:
Get ongoing lives by query string.
This is "Live" tab in the mobile app search page.
You can find direct video url in result.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Keyword you want to find in live streams

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Offset to get more results if \\\"has_more\\\" field equal 1
It can be any positive integer or you can get it from \\\"cursor\\\" field

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
Specify a region(default US).
Supported any region like: RU, US, GB, DE, FR, ES, AU, BR, CA, GR, IL, IT, MX, NL, PE, PL, SE, UA, VE, etc...

api_list.name: Hashtag(challenge) search
api_list.description:
Get hashtags(challenges) by query string.
This is "Hashtags" tab in the mobile app search page

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Keyword you want to find in hashtags(challenges)

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Offset to get more results if \"has_more\" field equal 1
It can be any positive integer or you can get it from \"cursor\" field

api_list.name: Search suggestion
api_list.description:
Get suggestion for search query.
Suggestion from TikTok for search.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Keyword you need to get suggestions for.

api_list.name: Music search
api_list.description:
Get music by query string.
This is "Sounds" tab in the mobile app search page

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Keyword you want to find in music

optional_parameters.name: filter
optional_parameters.description:
Filter result.
Possible values(default 0):
0 -all
1 - title
2 - creators

optional_parameters.name: sort
offset
optional_parameters.description:
Offset to get more results if \"has_more\" field equal 1
It can be any positive integer or you can get it from \"cursor\" field

api_list.name: Videos search
api_list.description:
Get videos by query string.
This is "Video" tab in the mobile app search page

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: Keyword you want to find in videos

optional_parameters.name: time
sort
optional_parameters.description:
Sorting you want apply to result.
Possible values(default 0):
0 - relevance; 
1 - most liked

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Offset to get more results if \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"has_more\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\" field equal 1
It can be any positive integer or you can get it from \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"cursor\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\" field

api_list.name: Top
api_list.description:
Get everything that related to your query: users, videos, music, hashtags, etc.
It is first tab in the app if you hit search button.

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: This is what you want to find

optional_parameters.name: time
sort
optional_parameters.description:
Sorting you want apply to result.
Possible values(default 0):
0 - relevance; 
1 - most liked

api_list.name: Comments reply
api_list.description: Get reply comments to specific comment for video

required_parameters.name: comment_id
required_parameters.description: Comment id that you can get from comments endpoint from \\\\\\\"cid\\\\\\\" field

required_parameters.name: video_id
required_parameters.description: Id of the video that owns the comment

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Offset to get more comments. You can pass \\\\\\\"cursor\\\\\\\" field from previous request if \\\\\\\"has_more\\\\\\\" field equal 1

api_list.name: Video comments
api_list.description: Get all comments for specific video

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Video id you can find it in \\\\\\\"aweme_id\\\\\\\" field

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Offset to get more comments if \\\\\\\"has_more\\\\\\\" field equal 1
It can be any positive integer or you can get it from \\\\\\\"cursor\\\\\\\" field

api_list.name: Video info
api_list.description: Get all info about video by id

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description:
Retrieve this value from field \\\"aweme_id\\\" or from link for example:
link: https://www.tiktok.com/@watchs01/video/7013267270252252421
video id(aweme_id): 7013267270252252421
